AccountCreated.description: When the person was first created

AlternatePhoneNumberSmsEnabled.description: To know if we can send out SMS campaigns

BatchPublicKey.description: Each person in a census import batch will have this to help troubleshoot import issues

BenefitsEffectiveDate.description: Used to provide an effective date for health bundle cart and benefits tables. Allows overriding the client level BenefitsEffectiveDate for special enrollment.

BenefitsEligible.description: We should not allow anyone that is not eligible in our system.  If they fall out of eligibility we can deactivate them.  Leaving this in case there is something in our system that is still using it.

ClientPublicKey.description: The company the person is a member of.

CobraBenefitsEffectiveDate.description: If the employee elects to extend their benefits via COBRA this is the date that those benefits would become effective.  The is always the first of the month following TerminationDate.

CobraBenefitsEligibleEndDate.description: The end of the window of time that the employee can decide if they want to extend their benefits via COBRA. This date is inclusive

CobraBenefitsEligibleStartDate.description: The start of the window of time that the employee can decide if they want to extend their benefits via COBRA. This date is inclusive

CobraLetterPostDate.description: When manually entered, this tracks the date the COBRA letter sent to the employee was postmarked and is used to determine the CobraBenefitsEligibleStartDate if it is later than the CobraBenefitsEffectiveDate.

CobraMonthsOnExisting.description: The number of months the employee has been on COBRA before migrating to Hixme.    Leave blank if not on COBRA.

CompanyEmployeeId.description: The id provided by the company for the employee.  The dependent also has a matching id so we know they are related

ContributionGroup.description: Optional field that allows a person to override the default contribution to get special bundle rates

CustomField1.description: Not used by Hixme but passed through for payroll and funding

CustomField2.description: Not used by Hixme but passed through for payroll and funding

CustomField3.description: Not used by Hixme but passed through for payroll and funding

CustomField4.description: Not used by Hixme but passed through for payroll and funding

DateOfBirth.description: Used to know their age as of the BenefitsEffectiveDate as this can affect rates and elgibility

Department.description: Will be used in the future

DivisionCode.description: Currently used by HCC for payroll deductions

EmailAddress.description: Not required, but highly recommended for employee. Otherwise phone number must be provided. Must be unique, used for login and carrier application submission

EmployeePublicKey.description: Used to identify the employee in the family.  All members will have matching EmployeePublicKey

EmploymentStatus.description: Set to Terminated to show Cobra rates.  Full-Time and Part-Time are required for ACA reporting

EnrollmentEndDate.description: Optional.  Used to allow the person to override client level enrollment period for special enrollment. This date is inclusive.

EnrollmentStartDate.description: Optional.  Used to allow the person to override client level enrollment period for special enrollment. This date is inclusive.

ExistingMedicalPlanEnrollmentTier.description: Optional.  This is to capture their existing group plan enrollment tier and used to be used for pricing. ContributionGroup is now used.

ExistingMedicalPlanName.description: Optional.  This is to capture their existing group plan name and used to be used for special pricing. ContributionGroup is now used.

ExistingMedicalPlanWaived.description: Used to be used know if they waived their existing group plan.  If not waived, plan name and tier were used for grandfathering.   ContributionGroup is now used.

HireDate.description: Used to generate a BenefitsEffectiveDate for a special enrollments period.

HixmeEmailAlias.description: We generate this email for use during carrier submission so they don't get spammed durring the submission

IdentityCreated.description: Used by cognito user creation to know if the identity has been created yet

IdentityVerified.description: Used by cognito user creation to know if the identity has been verified yet

IncludedInMedical.description: If false, allows person to quickly bypass questions and bundle selection

IsActive.description: If false, person will not show up in lists

IsEligibleForEmployeerPaidBenefits.description: True when they not a child or they are under 26 years old

IsExempt.description: Exempt employees are salaried and are exempt from getting overtime

IsOnGroupHealth.description: If person has unmigrated from inidividual to group health.

IsTestUser.description: Allows test users to be excluded from reports

IsValid.description: If person has passed model validation, will be true.  Used by front end to know if they need to edit thier personal info because rating area or something else important has not been set.

JobTitle.description: Was used by one company to filter which benefits the person was shown

MarriageStatus.description: Needed for some carrier sites to submit applications

PayrollClass.description: Will be used in the future

PayrollCycle.description: Used to show appropriate payroll cycle

PhoneNumberSmsEnabled.description: To know if we can send out SMS campaigns

PreviousCoverageEndDate.description: The last day of coverage after termination

SSN.description: This is required mostly for use as a person id so when a census update is done we can identify which person is being updated because some companies don't have a CompanyEmployeeId.   It is optional for most carrier health applications.

SSNHmac.description: Used for ensuring SSN is unique

Salary.description: Used for calculating gap financing.  If zero no gap will be available.   ACA, Payroll, and Kashable need it too. Voluntary ADD uses to calculate max limit on benefit provided

Smoker.description: Some states have higher health insurance premiums if you smoke

StateProvince.description: Uppercase two letter state the worker lives in

TerminationDate.description: Used to calculate Cobra eligible date

VerifiedPersonalInfo.description: True if the person has verfied their personal info in enrollme
